page.title: 01REVIEW OF THE AREA
page.content: THIS AREA OF THANET CONTAINS THE MAJOR PART OF MARGATE TOWN,THE SUBURB OF WESTBROOK AND TO THE WEST PART OF WESTGATE,ORIGINATELY A SETTLEMENT IN ITS OWN RIGHT .TO THE SOUTH AND WEST OF THE AREA THE TOWN BLENDS VERY QUICKLY IN TO FARMLAND WHICH IS ZEALOUSLY PROTECTED AGAINST FURTHER ENCROACHMENT.THE BUILT ENVIRONMENT IS GENERALLY OLD THOUGH THERE WAS INTER AND POST WAR GROWTH IN THE WEST.THE MAIN CENTRES OF HUMAN ACTIVITY ARE THE SEAFRONT IN MARGATE WITH ITS AMUSEMENTS AND FOOD SHOPS AND THE SHOPPING CENTRE.IT CAN BE AN ATTRACTIVE PART OF KENT ON THE RIGHT DAY WITH COAST TO THE NORTH AND COUNTRY TO THE SOUTH.
